Summary: Three objects from Southeast moved to Southwest disappeared pics video taken
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in St Catharines
There were no other sightings in St Catharines on or around September 1st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThree objects moved from south east to southwest, glowing orange.one disappeared then the other two moved to the Southwest. They also disappeared, then one reappeared further up and was ,oving extremely fast. Witnessed by three people. The most amazing thing is I took a picture of one of the lights in the distance, when I looked at the picture there was a very large circle object like an orb that came out in the picture. It was not there to the naked eye, and was very close. Multi colored orb....very very odd that it only showed up in the picture.
